What role do agnosticism and collaboration play in the democratization of the Internet, according to Verus?

According to Verus, agnosticism and collaboration are essential in ensuring the democratization of the Internet, which in turn helps to lower barriers of access, allowing everyone to participate in and benefit from new economies.
agnosticism and collaboration will help to ensure the democratization of the Internet and lower barriers of access so everyone can participate in, and benefit from, these new economies.

What is the ultimate goal of promoting agnosticism and collaboration in the context of Verus and the Internet?
The ultimate goal is to democratize the Internet, making it accessible to everyone, and allowing individuals to participate in and benefit from new economies.
agnosticism and collaboration will help to ensure the democratization of the Internet and lower barriers of access so everyone can participate in, and benefit from, these new economies.
